Aatsr.SST.Description: Computes sea surface temperature (SST) from (A)ATSR products.

AATSR.Ungrid.Description: Ungrids (A)ATSR L1B products and extracts geolocation and pixel field of view data.

AdaptiveThresholding.Description: Detect ships using Constant False Alarm Rate detector.

Arc.SST.Description: Computes sea surface temperature (SST) from (A)ATSR products.

ArviOp.Description: Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index belongs to a family of indices with built-in atmospheric corrections.

Azimuth-Shift-Estimation-ESD.Description: Estimate azimuth offset for the whole image

Back-Geocoding.Description: Bursts co-registration using orbit and DEM

BandMaths.Description: Create a product with one or more bands using mathematical expressions.

BandMerge.Description: Allows copying raster data from any number of source products to a specified master product.

BandSelect.Description: Creates a new product with only selected bands

BandsExtractorOp.Description: Creates a new product out of the source product containing only the indexes bands given

Bi2Op.Description: The Brightness index represents the average of the brightness of a satellite image. This index is sensitive to the brightness of soils which is highly correlated with the humidity and the presence of salts in surface

Binning.Description: Performs spatial and temporal aggregation of pixel values into cells (bins) of a planetary grid

BiOp.Description: The Brightness index represents the average of the brightness of a satellite image.

BiophysicalOp.Description: The Biophysical Processor operator retrieves LAI from atmospherically corrected Sentinel-2 products

c2rcc.landsat8.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval with uncertainties on Landsat-8 L1 data products.

c2rcc.meris.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval with uncertainties on MERIS L1b data products.

c2rcc.meris4.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval with uncertainties on MERIS L1b data products from the 4th reprocessing.

c2rcc.modis.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval on MODIS L1C_LAC data products.

c2rcc.msi.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval with uncertainties on Sentinel-2 MSI L1C data products.

c2rcc.olci.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval with uncertainties on SENTINEL-3 OLCI L1B data products.

c2rcc.seawifs.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval on SeaWifs L1C data products.

c2rcc.viirs.Description: Performs atmospheric correction and IOP retrieval on Viirs L1C data products.

CiOp.Description: Colour Index  was developed to differentiate soils in the field. In most cases the CI gives complementary information with the BI and the NDVI. Used for diachronic analyses, they help for a better understanding of the evolution of soil surfaces.

CloudProb.Description: Applies a clear sky conservative cloud detection algorithm.

Coherence.Description: Estimate coherence from stack of coregistered images

Collocate.Description: Collocates two products based on their geo-codings.

CoregistrationOp.Description: Coregisters two rasters, not considering their location

CP-Decomposition.Description: Perform Compact Polarimetric decomposition of a given product

CP-Simulation.Description: Simulation of Compact Pol data from Quad Pol data

CP-Stokes-Parameters.Description: Generates compact polarimetric Stokes child parameters

CreateStack.Description: Collocates two or more products based on their geo-codings.

Cross-Correlation.Description: Automatic Selection of Ground Control Points

CrossResampling.Description: Estimate Resampling Polynomial using SAR Image Geometry and Resample Input Images

DviOp.Description: Difference Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines parallel to soil line

Ellipsoid-Correction-RD.Description: Ellipsoid correction with RD method and average scene height

Enhanced-Spectral-Diversity.Description: Estimate constant range and azimuth offsets for the whole image

Fill-DEM-Hole.Description: Fill holes in given DEM product file.

Find-Image-Pair.Description: DB query to find matching image pair

FlhMci.Description: Computes fluorescence line height (FLH) or maximum chlorophyll index (MCI).

ForestCoverChangeOp.Description: Creates forrest change masks out of two source products

FUB.Water.Description: FUB/WeW WATER Processor to retrieve case II water properties and atmospheric properties

FuClassification.Description: Colour classification based on the discrete Forel-Ule scale.

GemiOp.Description: This retrieves the Global Environmental Monitoring Index (GEMI).

GenericRegionMergingOp.Description: The Generic Region Merging operator computes the distinct regions from a product

Idepix.L8.OLI.Description: Pixel identification and classification for Landsat-8 OLI instrument.

Idepix.Meris.Description: Pixel identification and classification for MERIS.

Idepix.Modis.Description: Pixel identification and classification for MODIS.

Idepix.Olci.Description: Pixel identification and classification for OLCI.

Idepix.Olci.Ctp.Description: CTP for OLCI based on Tensorflow neural nets.

Idepix.Probav.Description: Pixel identification and classification for PROBA-V.

Idepix.S2.Description: Pixel identification and classification for Sentinel-2 MSI.

Idepix.Seawifs.Description: Pixel identification and classification for SeaWiFS.

Idepix.Vgt.Description: Pixel identification and classification for SPOT-VGT.

Idepix.Viirs.Description: Pixel identification and classification for VIIRS.

Import-Vector.Description: Imports a shape file into a product

Interferogram.Description: Compute interferograms from stack of coregistered S-1 images

IpviOp.Description: Infrared Percentage Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines converge at origin

Land-Sea-Mask.Description: Creates a bitmask defining land vs ocean.

LandWaterMask.Description: Operator creating a target product with a single band containing a land/water-mask.

Mci.s2.Description: Computes maximum chlorophyll index (MCI) for Sentinel-2 MSI.

Merge.Description: Allows merging of several source products by using specified master as reference product.

Meris.CorrectRadiometry.Description: Performs radiometric corrections on MERIS L1b data products.

Meris.N1Patcher.Description: Copies an existing N1 file and replaces the data for the radiance bands

Mosaic.Description: Creates a mosaic out of a set of source products.

MphChl.Description: This operator computes maximum peak height of chlorophyll (MPH/CHL).

Msavi2Op.Description: This retrieves the second Modified Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index (MSAVI2).

MsaviOp.Description: This retrieves the Modified Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index (MSAVI).

MtciOp.Description: The Meris Terrestrial Chlorophyll Index, aims at estimating the Red Edge Position (REP). This is the maximum slant point in the red and near-infrared region of the vegetal spectral reflectance.It is useful for observing the chlorophyll contents, vegetation senescence, and stress for water and nutritional deficiencies, but it is less suitable for land classification

Multi-size Mosaic.Description: Creates a multi-size mosaic out of a set of source products.

Multilook.Description: Averages the power across a number of lines in both the azimuth and range directions

Ndi45Op.Description: Normalized Difference Index using bands 4 and 5

NdviOp.Description: The retrieves the Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI).

Ndwi2Op.Description: The Normalized Difference Water Index, allowing for the measurement of surface water extent

NdwiOp.Description: The Normalized Difference Water Index was developed for the extraction of water features

Object-Discrimination.Description: Remove false alarms from the detected objects.

Offset-Tracking.Description: Create velocity vectors from offset tracking

Oil-Spill-Clustering.Description: Remove small clusters from detected area.

OlciO2aHarmonisation.Description: Performs O2A band harmonisation on OLCI L1b product.

Orientation-Angle-Correction.Description: Perform polarization orientation angle correction for given coherency matrix

OWTClassification.Description: Performs an optical water type classification based on atmospherically corrected reflectances.

PduStitching.Description: Stitches multiple SLSTR L1B product dissemination units (PDUs) of the same orbit to a single product.

PhaseToDisplacement.Description: Phase To Displacement Conversion along LOS

PixEx.Description: Extracts pixels from given locations and source products.

Polarimetric-Classification.Description: Perform Polarimetric classification of a given product

Polarimetric-Decomposition.Description: Perform Polarimetric decomposition of a given product

Polarimetric-Matrices.Description: Generates covariance or coherency matrix for given product

PpeFiltering.Description: Performs Prompt Particle Event (PPE) filtering on OLCI L1B

PssraOp.Description: Pigment Specific Simple Ratio, chlorophyll index

PviOp.Description: Perpendicular Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines parallel to soil line. Soil line has an arbitrary slope and passes through origin

Rad2Refl.Description: Provides conversion from radiances to reflectances or backwards.

RayleighCorrection.Description: Performs radiometric corrections on OLCI, MERIS L1B, and S2 MSI L1C data products.

Read.Description: Reads a data product from a given file location.

ReflectanceToRadianceOp.Description: The Reflectance To Radiance Processor operator retrieves the radiance from reflectance using Sentinel-2 products

ReipOp.Description: The red edge inflection point index

RemoteExecutionOp.Description: The Remote Execution Processor executes on the remote machines a slave graph and then on the host machine it executes a master graph using the products created by the remote machines.

Remove-GRD-Border-Noise.Description: Mask no-value pixels for GRD product

ReplaceMetadata.Description: Replace the metadata of the first product with that of the second

Reproject.Description: Reprojection of a source product to a target Coordinate Reference System.

Resample.Description: Resampling of a multi-size source product to a single-size target product.

RiOp.Description: The Redness Index was developed to identify soil colour variations.

RviOp.Description: Ratio Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines converge at origin

S2RutOp.Description: Radiometric uncertainty tool for Sentinel-2 MSI L1C products.

SAR-Mosaic.Description: Mosaics two or more products based on their geo-codings.

SaviOp.Description: This retrieves the Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index (SAVI).

Segmentation-cc.Description: Performs segmentation of an image, and output either a raster or a vector file. In vector mode, large input datasets are supported.

Segmentation-meanshift.Description: Performs segmentation of an image, and output either a raster or a vector file. In vector mode, large input datasets are supported.

Segmentation-mprofiles.Description: Performs segmentation of an image, and output either a raster or a vector file. In vector mode, large input datasets are supported.

Segmentation-watershed.Description: Performs segmentation of an image, and output either a raster or a vector file. In vector mode, large input datasets are supported.

SetNoDataValue.Description: Set NoDataValueUsed flag and NoDataValue for all bands

SFSTextureExtraction.Description: Computes Structural Feature Set textures on every pixel of the input image selected channel

SmacOp.Description: Applies the Simplified Method for Atmospheric Corrections of Envisat MERIS/(A)ATSR measurements.

SmosNetcdfExport.Description: Exports SMOS Earth Explorer products to NetCDF format.

SnaphuExport.Description: Export data and prepare conf file for SNAPHU processing

SnaphuImport.Description: Ingest SNAPHU results into InSAR product.

SpectralAngleMapperOp.Description: Classifies a product using the spectral angle mapper algorithm

SRGR.Description: Converts Slant Range to Ground Range

StatisticsOp.Description: Computes statistics for an arbitrary number of source products.

SubGraph.Description: Encapsulates a graph within a graph.

Subset.Description: Create a spatial and/or spectral subset of a data product.

TemporalPercentile.Description: Computes percentiles over a given time period.

TileWriter.Description: Writes a data product to a tiles.

TndviOp.Description: Transformed Normalized Difference Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines parallel to soil line

TOPSAR-DerampDemod.Description: Bursts co-registration using orbit and DEM

TOPSAR-Merge.Description: Merge subswaths of a Sentinel-1 TOPSAR product

TOPSAR-Split.Description: Creates a new product with only the selected subswath

TsaviOp.Description: This retrieves the Transformed Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index (TSAVI).

Warp.Description: Create Warp Function And Get Co-registrated Images

WdviOp.Description: Weighted Difference Vegetation Index retrieves the Isovegetation lines parallel to soil line. Soil line has an arbitrary slope and passes through origin

Write.Description: Writes a data product to a file.
